memberSubfamily_subset_nonMemberSubfamil:
#print IsLowerSet.memberSubfamily_subset_nonMemberSubfamily /-
theorem IsLowerSet.memberSubfamily_subset_nonMemberSubfamily (h : IsLowerSet (ð’œ : Set (Finset Î±))) :
    ð’œ.member_subfamily a âŠ† ð’œ.non_member_subfamily a := fun s =>

memberSubfamily:
#print IsLowerSet.memberSubfamily /-
theorem IsLowerSet.memberSubfamily (h : IsLowerSet (ð’œ : Set (Finset Î±))) :
    IsLowerSet (ð’œ.member_subfamily a : Set (Finset Î±)) :=
  by
  rintro s t hts
  simp_rw [mem_coe, mem_member_subfamily]
  exact and.imp (h <| insert_subset_insert _ hts) (mt <| @hts _)
#align is_lower_set.member_subfamily IsLowerSet.memberSubfamily
-/
le_card_inter_finset':
#print IsLowerSet.le_card_inter_finset' /-
/-- **Harris-Kleitman inequality**: Any two lower sets of finsets correlate. -/
theorem IsLowerSet.le_card_inter_finset' (hð’œ : IsLowerSet (ð’œ : Set (Finset Î±))) (hâ„¬ : IsLowerSet (â„¬ : Set (Finset Î±)))
    (hð’œs : âˆ€ t âˆˆ ð’œ, t âŠ† s) (hâ„¬s : âˆ€ t âˆˆ â„¬, t âŠ† s) : ð’œ.card * â„¬.card â‰¤ 2 ^ s.card * (ð’œ âˆ© â„¬).card :=
  by
  induction' s using Finset.induction with a s hs ih generalizing ð’œ â„¬
  Â· simp_rw [subset_empty, â† subset_singleton_iff', subset_singleton_iff] at hð’œs hâ„¬s
    obtain rfl | rfl := hð’œs
    Â· simp only [card_empty, empty_inter, MulZeroClass.mul_zero, MulZeroClass.zero_mul]
    obtain rfl | rfl := hâ„¬s
    Â· simp only [card_empty, inter_empty, MulZeroClass.mul_zero, MulZeroClass.zero_mul]
    Â· simp only [card_empty, pow_zero, inter_singleton_of_mem, mem_singleton, card_singleton]
  rw [card_insert_of_not_mem hs, â† card_member_subfamily_add_card_non_member_subfamily a ð’œ, â†
    card_member_subfamily_add_card_non_member_subfamily a â„¬, add_mul, mul_add, mul_add, add_comm (_ * _),
    add_add_add_comm]
  refine'
    (add_le_add_right
          (mul_add_mul_le_mul_add_mul (card_le_of_subset hð’œ.member_subfamily_subset_non_member_subfamily) <|
            card_le_of_subset hâ„¬.member_subfamily_subset_non_member_subfamily)
          _).trans
      _
  rw [â† two_mul, pow_succ, mul_assoc]
  have hâ‚€ : âˆ€ ð’ž : Finset (Finset Î±), (âˆ€ t âˆˆ ð’ž, t âŠ† insert a s) â†’ âˆ€ t âˆˆ ð’ž.non_member_subfamily a, t âŠ† s :=
    by
    rintro ð’ž hð’ž t ht
    rw [mem_non_member_subfamily] at ht
    exact (subset_insert_iff_of_not_mem ht.2).1 (hð’ž _ ht.1)
  have hâ‚ : âˆ€ ð’ž : Finset (Finset Î±), (âˆ€ t âˆˆ ð’ž, t âŠ† insert a s) â†’ âˆ€ t âˆˆ ð’ž.member_subfamily a, t âŠ† s :=
    by
    rintro ð’ž hð’ž t ht
    rw [mem_member_subfamily] at ht
    exact (subset_insert_iff_of_not_mem ht.2).1 ((subset_insert _ _).trans <| hð’ž _ ht.1)
  refine' mul_le_mul_left' _ _
  refine'
    (add_le_add (ih hð’œ.member_subfamily hâ„¬.member_subfamily (hâ‚ _ hð’œs) <| hâ‚ _ hâ„¬s) <|
          ih hð’œ.non_member_subfamily hâ„¬.non_member_subfamily (hâ‚€ _ hð’œs) <| hâ‚€ _ hâ„¬s).trans_eq
      _
  rw [â† mul_add, â† member_subfamily_inter, â† non_member_subfamily_inter,
    card_member_subfamily_add_card_non_member_subfamily]
#align is_lower_set.le_card_inter_finset' IsLowerSet.le_card_inter_finset'
-/
le_card_inter_finset:
#print IsUpperSet.le_card_inter_finset /-
/-- **Harris-Kleitman inequality**: Any two upper sets of finsets correlate. -/
theorem IsUpperSet.le_card_inter_finset (hð’œ : IsUpperSet (ð’œ : Set (Finset Î±))) (hâ„¬ : IsUpperSet (â„¬ : Set (Finset Î±))) :
    ð’œ.card * â„¬.card â‰¤ 2 ^ Fintype.card Î± * (ð’œ âˆ© â„¬).card :=
  by
  rw [â† isLowerSet_compl, â† coe_compl] at hð’œ
  have := hð’œ.card_inter_le_finset hâ„¬
  rwa [card_compl, Fintype.card_finset, tsub_mul, le_tsub_iff_le_tsub, â† mul_tsub, â†
    card_sdiff (inter_subset_right _ _), sdiff_inter_self_right, sdiff_compl, _root_.inf_comm] at this
  Â· exact mul_le_mul_left' (card_le_of_subset <| inter_subset_right _ _) _
  Â· rw [â† Fintype.card_finset]
    exact mul_le_mul_right' (card_le_univ _) _
#align is_upper_set.le_card_inter_finset IsUpperSet.le_card_inter_finset
-/
card_inter_le_finset:
#print IsLowerSet.card_inter_le_finset /-
/-- **Harris-Kleitman inequality**: Lower sets and upper sets of finsets anticorrelate. -/
theorem IsLowerSet.card_inter_le_finset (hð’œ : IsLowerSet (ð’œ : Set (Finset Î±))) (hâ„¬ : IsUpperSet (â„¬ : Set (Finset Î±))) :
    2 ^ Fintype.card Î± * (ð’œ âˆ© â„¬).card â‰¤ ð’œ.card * â„¬.card :=
  by
  rw [inter_comm, mul_comm ð’œ.card]
  exact hâ„¬.card_inter_le_finset hð’œ
#align is_lower_set.card_inter_le_finset IsLowerSet.card_inter_le_finset
-/
